6.45: Rescaled  Electric Rave activation manacost from 10 on each level to 6/9/10/15. Increased Barrier cooldown from 15 to 20.  Overload no longer applies a dispel to hit enemy units. Increased  Lightning Grapple cast range from 600/900/1200 to 700/1050/1400.
6.46: Lightning Grapple no longer pulls non-hero units.
6.47: Electric Rave Fixed sometimes not stopping to drain mana after toggled off. Reduced activation manacost from 6/9/12/15 to 3/6/9/12.
6.69: Increased base  intelligence and gain from 26 + 2.6 to 23 + 2.2. Increased  Electric Vortex manacost from 100 on each level to 100/110/120/130.
6.60: Electric Vortex is now blocked by  Linken's Sphere.
6.72d: Increased base  strength from 17 to 19. Fixed  Static Remnant triggering on some dummy units of spells.
6.78: Reduced  Electric Vortex cooldown from 20 to 21/20/19/18.
6.50: Increased base armor from -1 to 3 (total armor is now 4.38). Fixed  Electric Rave toggling itself off when affected by  Last Word.  Overload no longer uses its charge up when attacking allied units.
6.75: Reduced  Static Remnant cooldown from 4 to 3.5.
6.58: Reworked Storm Spirit. Reduced base  strength and gain from 22 + 2.5 to 17 + 1.5. Increased base  agility and gain from 17 + 1.5 to 22 + 1.8. Reduced attack range from 600 to 500. Reduced movement speed from 310 to 295. Replaced  Electric Rave with  Static Remnant
6.59: Ball Lightning now gives an error message when cast without enough mana.
6.82: Rescaled  Ball Lightning manacost per 100 traveled units from 10 + 1% to 12 + 0.7% of max mana.
6.84: Reduced movement speed from 290 to 285.  Static Remnant damage no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes. Reduced  Ball Lightning vision range from 1000 to 400.
6.44b: Fixed  Overload attack counter counting wrong at high attack speeds. Fixed  Electric Rave from triggering  Essence Aura and  Curse of the Silent.
6.46b: Fixed a bug between  Lightning Grapple and  Aegis of the Immortal.
